name: Dwimmered Glimmer
text: Activate this card by banishing 1 face-up monster you control or 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Spellcaster/LIGHT/ATK 0/DEF 0) with the same Level as that banished monster. (This card is also still a Trap.) You can only activate 1 "Dwimmered Glimmer" per turn.
